metadata.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Just Solved Foldables’ Biggest Problem

left: Google unveiled the Pixel 10 Pro Fold and other new devices at its Made by Google event, starting at $999 and $1,199 respectively.
The Pixel 10 Pro Fold features a larger battery, improved camera sensors, and enhanced durability with an IP68 rating.
Google claims the battery life will improve from 24 hours to 30 hours, supported by a 5,015mAh battery.
All versions come with 16GB of RAM and will receive seven years of OS and security updates.
center: Google unveiled the Pixel 10 Pro Fold and other new devices at its Made by Google event, starting at $999 and $1,199 respectively.
